title: Fire-juggling unicyclist performs for busy traffic
description: Colorado Police were stunned after receiving several calls reporting a fire-juggling unicyclist who stopped traffic at a busy intersection in Commerce City, US. While the police department acknowledged the man's act was "quite good," it was also illegal due to his trespassing in the median and not exiting the pedestrian in time.  The fire-juggling unicyclist was not fined but was ushered away from the intersection. #juggling #traffic #Colorado #police
